mockData.title: E-commerce Platform MVP
mockData.description: Build a minimum viable product for an online marketplace targeting small businesses. Focus on core features like product listings, user authentication, and basic payment processing.

mockData.title: Personal Fitness App
mockData.description: Develop a mobile-first web application for tracking workouts, nutrition, and progress. Include social features for motivation and accountability.

mockData.title: Smart Home Dashboard
mockData.description: Create a centralized dashboard for managing IoT devices in the home. Started as a learning project but putting on hold to focus on other priorities.
